author: svn-role
msg: This removes an inconsistency; we don't limit object sizes anywhere
else. Particularly, we allowed for unlimited revprop sizes when setting
them but had a 16MB limit in the getter.

author: svn-role
msg: Properly handle a corner case in svn_io_read_length_line().
Don't get in an endless loop when repos/db/uuid contains a \r\n instead
of a \n. (Some testcode of one user got in this case by applying a hack

author: hansbak
msg: fixed problem of not able to add accounting company, caused by r1494034 and reported by Pierre at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5229
